Pimp My Ride

Brief

Make an site where people can buy absurt packages for a vehicle.

Concept

Since I love snow, I decided to pimp dogsleds. My target audience were people with enormous amounts of money. The packages went from crazy (your typical sled with a sauna on top) to over the top (an apartment building on sleds dragged through the snow buy hundreds of dogs). Hover over the bear in the footer for a little easter egg!

Team

Me

Used tech

JS, SCSS, HTML, Gulp
